Scripts.OnMouseUp: if ( self.sortType and self.func ) then self.func(self.sortType,self.asc); self.asc = not self.asc end

if MiDKP.UI.DKP.dkp and MiDKP.UI.DKP.dkp >0 then self.sortType = MiDKP.Data.Suites:Get(MiDKP.UI.DKP.dkp):GetName() else if MiDKP.DO.Config:GetConfig("use_history") then self.sortType = "leftPoint" else self.sortType = "totaldkp"
end end MiDKP.UI.DKP.OnColumnHeaderClick(self.sortType,self.asc) self.asc = not self.asc

Scripts.OnKeyDown: if key =="ESCAPE" then self:Hide() end if key =="ENTER" then MiDKP.UI.EditPanel:OnOkClick() end
if key =="ESCAPE" then self:Hide() end if key =="ENTER" then MiDKP.UI.RaidEditPanel:OnOkClick(self); end
if key =="ESCAPE" then self:Hide() end if key =="ENTER" then MiDKP.UI.MemberEditPanel:OnOkClick() end
